title: Greeneville official hospitalized after accidental shooting
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
GREENEVILLE, TN (WJHL) – The City of Greeneville confirms a town official was injured after an accidental shooting.
Greeneville Building Official Jeff Woods was accidentally shot when a gun in his coat pocket discharged, striking him in the left side of his stomach.
The incident happened around 10:30 a.m. in the parking lot of a doctors’ office on Y Street.
Woods was exiting his work vehicle when the .22 caliber handgun discharged. Woods was not on duty at the time.
He was taken to the Laughlin Memorial Hospital, then airlifted to the Johnson City Medical Center where he remains in stable condition.
